description:
A young test pilot of the Principality of Zeon during the One Year War who was tasked with data acquisition on the battlefield. Following the war, he returns to the Earth Sphere on Axis with Arlette. Although he lived a reclusive life with Arlette following the Axis Shock, but he will once again face his past on Axis.
Source: zeonic-republic.net
name: Danton Hyleg
